name: Jesús Martínez del Rincón
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor Jesus Martinez Del Rincon Director of Postgraduate Research & Professor of Secure and Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence (AI) E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 1779 Fax: +44 (0)28 9097 1702 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/jesus-martinez-del-rincon Room: 02/22Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology,Titanic Quarter AlternateRoom: 03.032Computer Science Building 16A Malone Road Belfast BT9 5BN PostalAddress: The Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ECIT) Queen’s University Belfast NI Science Park Queen’s Road Queen’s Island Belfast BT3 9DT Research Interests:   Human motion analysis – Pose estimation Activity recognition Tracking algorithms - Multi-target tracking in real time Research Clusters:   Centre for Secure Information Technologies (CSIT) Centre for Intelligent Sustainable Computing (CISC) Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
